body: Thanks for the explanation. If I understand correctly, you are trying to make trade with loss caused by split for making mobile or high-latency TLS speakers happy, and not trying to utilize hierarchical buffers along a path comprised of high latency links. If so, automatic record size adjustment/clamping based on TCP MSS (or path/link IP MTU) might make low-latency TLS speakers frown unless we provide a control knob.
